page.title: 04Scouts
page.content: Scouts The first troop was founded in 1909 by the Rev.E.B.Jones and registered as the 2nd Anglesey Troop. Originally they met at St Cybi's Church but now plans are being drawn up for a new headquarters in Cambrian St.The sum ofÂ£1000 has been built up by various fund raising activites,also financial assistance has come from various sources such as,the Prince of Wales trust,Anglesey Borough counciland the Shell oil revenues. The main hall will be known as the M.V.St.Columba Hall and the Venture Scouts Den as the M.V.St.David. The troop held a fun day on Newry beach on July 20 to raise funds for their scheme.
